ygData.subject: Re: Hunting at 14..
ygData.msgSnippet: they arent bad if you have a good skel, and a lot of hp =)  basilisks arent a one person job, unless you are a tank i suppose.  i killed several, and it worked
ygData.messageBody:
they arent bad if you have a good skel, and a lot of hp =) basilisks arent
a one person job, unless you are a tank i suppose. i killed several, and it
worked out well. one alternated stoning me and my pet, and didnt do much dmg
to either of us.



>From: Jerry Luttrell <tinarin@...>
>
>Lava Basilisks aren't a good idea solo... They can be in the higs teens in
>lvl, and they can keep you stunned if you are unlucky...
>
>
>>From: Brian J Ferguson <bjf10@...>
>>Reply-To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
>>To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
>>Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Hunting at 14..
>>Date: Tue, 06 Jul 1999 00:14:50 -0700
>>
>>From: Brian J Ferguson <bjf10@...>
>>
>>I can kill nearly all fire elementals in Lavastorm at level 13, most near
>>the entrance /con blue to me... And they give quite a good amount of exp.
>>Lava basilisks are good targets as well.
>>
>>Giltaagin
>>
>> >From: "Mark Muller" <markm@...>
>> >
>> >Try lavastorm, just make sure you have a good pet. and stick to drakes
>>at
>> >14, avoid elementals :)
>> >
>> >----- Original Message -----

>>and
>> >> don't give exp, the rest just kick my ___. I tried Befallen but all

>> >>
>> >> Help?
>> >>
